arts.ttl: Are Al-Nassr better without Cristiano Ronaldo?! Sadio Mane scores four against 10-man Al-Akhdoud as CR7's side record their biggest EVER win in his absence with 9-0 thumping | Goal.com UK
arts.sum: Al-Nassr were on top form against Al-Akhdoud and showed off that they can perform without Cristiano Ronaldo as they grabbed a massive 8-0 win.

arts.ttl: Al-Okhdood vs Al-Nassr LIVE Score Updates: First half (0-0) | 05/12/2025
arts.sum: Get real-time updates on Al-Okhdood vs Al-Nassr live coverage minute by minute of the match, score and result online, stream information, how to watch, TV channel, lineups, latest updates and time of the Saudi Pro League with VAVEL. Game will start at 14:00 hrs ET on May 12th, 2025.
